channel.title: Comments on: Two weeks in Montenegro

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/two-weeks-montenegro/#comment-254315">Ali</a>.
Hi Ali, no I don't think you could do this trip without a car. We visited some pretty remote spots - the farmstays and hikes - which you wouldn't be able to reach by public transport. It was easy to drive ourselves though, and a fun way to explore the country. Hope you have a good trip!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Ali.

Hi Ali, no I don’t think you could do this trip without a car. We visited some pretty remote spots – the farmstays and hikes – which you wouldn’t be able to reach by public transport. It was easy to drive ourselves though, and a fun way to explore the country. Hope you have a good trip!

item.title: By: Ali
item.dc:creator: Ali
item.description: Great blog, thank you! Do you think this sort of holiday is possible without a car?
item.content:encoded: Great blog, thank you! Do you think this sort of holiday is possible without a car?

item.title: By: Sabrina Brett
item.dc:creator: Sabrina Brett
item.description: Such a great adventure! Did you need a border-permit, or did you need to register with the police, when you hiked in the Prokletije mountains?
item.content:encoded: Such a great adventure! Did you need a border-permit, or did you need to register with the police, when you hiked in the Prokletije mountains?

item.title: By: Sabrina Brett
item.dc:creator: Sabrina Brett
item.description: Love everything about this Montenegro post and the photographs are just fantastic!!
item.content:encoded: Love everything about this Montenegro post and the photographs are just fantastic!!

item.title: By: Amy
item.dc:creator: Amy
item.description: This trip sounds idyllic in every way! These stunning photos beckon one to the Balkans and bring about a wanderlust envy.
item.content:encoded: This trip sounds idyllic in every way! These stunning photos beckon one to the Balkans and bring about a wanderlust envy.

item.title: By: Brad
item.dc:creator: Brad
item.description: Such beautiful photos! I want to eat eggs from truly free-range chickens. Very interesting place.
item.content:encoded: Such beautiful photos! I want to eat eggs from truly free-range chickens. Very interesting place.
